snippet.title: The Escaper Trailer
snippet.description:
The Escaper is a new escape room game with realtime 3d graphics that will challenge your skills and wits!
Discover hidden clues and solve challenging physics-based puzzles in order to escape.

You have the option to go through the authentic escape room experience with a limited time session or you can enjoy it at your own pace without the pressure of time.
 

Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1234520/The_Escaper/
Google Play Page: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nocturnalworks.theescaper1


 FEATURES:
◈ Fully 3d realtime detailed graphics.
◈ Unique Physics-based puzzles.
◈ Intuitive touch controls.
◈ Explore four different themed rooms.
◈ Carefully hidden clues into the scenery.
◈ Atmospheric music and sound effects.
